1.1.0.name: wordpress/pinterest-for-galleries
1.1.0.description:
Pinterest for Galleries adds a pin-it button under each thumbnail of WordPress galleries (the ones added to posts with the native WordPress gallery feature).

It does not work with NextGen Gallery and may not work with customized galleries (it depends on themes and/or other plugins).

Discussion forum: http://www.satollo.net/forums/forum/pinterest-for-galleries-plugin
